articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: General Abdourahmane Tchiani is addressing the nation after staging a coup.
articles.title: Niger coup: General Tchiani declares himself leader

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Until now, Mr Trump has largely shunned appearing at events with rivals over whom he maintains a big lead.
articles.title: Trump, DeSantis and other Republican rivals to share Iowa stage

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Residents escape by boat and the air force evacuates fighter planes as an ammunition depot explodes.
articles.title: Greek fires at Nea Anchialos prompt blasts forcing F-16s to evacuate base

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: A man is detained in Italy after he was seen at the scene of a wildfire in Calabria.
articles.title: Watch: Drone spots suspected wildfire arsonist

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Ukraine will now mark Christmas Day on 25 December - the latest step to distance itself from Russia.
articles.title: Ukraine moves Christmas Day in snub to Russia

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The body was discovered earlier this month by hikers who spotted a boot emerging from the ice.
articles.title: Melting Swiss glacier uncovers climber missing since 1986

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.description: Juventus are kicked out of this season's Europa Conference League and fined for breaching Financial Fair Play rules, Uefa has announced.
articles.title: Juventus kicked out of Europe by Uefa

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Carlee Russell, 25, is accused of false reporting to law enforcement and falsely reporting an incident.
articles.title: Carlee Russell: Alabama woman who faked kidnapping charged

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The rival to Twitter saw explosive growth but users have since drifted away, Meta boss acknowledges.
articles.title: Mark Zuckerberg: Threads users down by more than a half

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: A robbery suspect in Ohio is arrested after falling from a bank's roof into a bin in front of police officers.
articles.title: Burglar lands in bin in botched escape attempt
